description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Purchase_Order_AcknowledgementObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Purchase_Order_AcknowledgementObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.

Purchase_Order_AcknowledgementObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Refers to an existing Purchase Order Acknowledgement for update only.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

WorkerObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Default the Person making the comment to the processing person if not submitted via the web service.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: Captures the Comment for the Business Process.

description: Business Process Parameters provide the ability to auto-submit to the business process.

Purchase_Order_Acknowledgement_Data.description: Refers to the unique purchase order acknowledgement identifier.
Indicates whether or not the POA should be submitted to the business process.

validation.validation: At least one line must have an acknowledgement status other than unacknowledged.
You must provide a purchase order acknowledgement line on the POA.

Refers to the unique purchase order acknowledgement line identifier.  This Reference ID will be ignored if a Purchase Order Acknowledgement instance is already present.

validation.validation: Cannot acknowledge an already acknowledged purchase order line.
validation.description: Cannot acknowledge an already acknowledged purchase order line.

validation.validation: The Web Service is set to Add Only; Acknowledgement line cannot be resubmitted.
validation.description: The Web Service is set to Add Only; Acknowledgement line cannot be resubmitted.

validation.validation: Acknowledgement already exists. Only existing lines on the Purchase Order Acknowledgement can be updated.
validation.description: Acknowledgement already exists. Only existing lines on the Purchase Order Acknowledgement can be updated.

PO_Acknowledgement_Line_Data.description: Refers to a purchase order line for goods associated with a POA line.
Item Identifier for the associated purchase order line's Purchase or Catalog Item. Cannot be entered for Submit. It is only returned by Get.

validation.validation: Item Identifier can't be entered. Used only for Get Purchase Order Acknowledgement Web Service.

PO_Acknowledgement_Line_Data.description: Refers to the acknowledgement status for a POA line.  The status may be either Accepted, Accepted with Changes, Rejected, or Unacknowledged.

validation.validation: Not a valid acknowledgement status for a POA line.
validation.description: Not a valid acknowledgement status for a POA line.

PO_Acknowledgement_Line_Data.description: Refers to a supplied text description of the purchase item for the POA line.  The description will default as blank.
Refers to the supplier item quantity for the POA line.

validation.validation: For Full Quantity Backordered, Quantity needs to be zero.

PO_Acknowledgement_Line_Data.description: Refers to the item unit of measurement for the POA line.
Refers to the item unit cost on the POA line.
Refers to the memo for the POA line.
Refers to the supplier backordered quantity for the purchase order acknowlegement.

validation.validation: For Full Quantity Backordered, Backordered Quantity should be equal or more than PO Line Quantity

PO_Acknowledgement_Line_Data.description: Refers to the supplier backorder date for goods items.

Line_Alternate_Item_Attribute_Value_Data.description: Reference to existing  Manufacturer associated with the Item Identifier Type

PO_Acknowledgement_Line_Data.description: Alternate Item Identifiers for Item on Purchase Order Acknowledgement Line

validation.validation: Enter a 14 digit numeric value for GTIN Alternate Item Identifier.
Only alphanumeric values are allowed for UPN.
Value needs to be provided for Manufacturer.
Value needs to be provided for [ExternalName].
Enter a valid GTIN
Manufacturer Reference not allowed for [ExternalName]
Can't enter duplicate External Name if Allow Multiples flag is not enabled for Item Identifier mapped to [ExternalName].
Invalid value for External Name [ET].
Alternate Item Identifier, [type] has to be less than or equal to [length] characters in length.

Purchase_Order_Acknowledgement_Data.description: Refers to purchase order acknowledgement lines.

validation.validation: Quantity cannot be negative
The Purchase Order line associated with the Purchase Order Acknowledgement line must be for a goods line.
validation.description: The Purchase Order line associated with the Purchase Order Acknowledgement line must be for a goods line.

validation.validation: A Purchase Order line in 'Cancel' status cannot be acknowledged.
validation.description: A Purchase Order line in 'Cancel' status cannot be acknowledged.

validation.validation: POA Line Data contains duplicate POA Line References or Line Reference IDs.  Each POA Line should have a unique ID.
validation.description: POA Line Data contains duplicate POA Line References or Line Reference IDs.  Each POA Line should have a unique ID.

validation.validation: Both Quantity and Backordered Quantity cannot be zero
validation.description: Both Quantity and Backordered Quantity cannot be zero

validation.validation: A Purchase Order line in ‘Closed for Receiving’ status cannot be acknowledged.
validation.description: A Purchase Order line in ‘Closed for Receiving’ status cannot be acknowledged.

validation.validation: Purchase Order Line Number [po line number] is closed and can't be used.

Financials_Attachment_Data.description: Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Filename of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Encoding of the Attachment.
Boolean attribute identifying whether the Attachment is compressed.

Purchase_Order_Acknowledgement_Data.description: Refers to purchase order acknowledgement attachment data.

validation.validation: If a file name is specified for a Financial Attachment, File Content and Content Type are required.

description: Contains purchase order acknowledgement header and line data.

validation.validation: This Purchase Order cannot be acknowledged because it is not Issued, has no eligible unacknowledged lines, is for a Contract (Contingent) Worker, or has lines that are closed for receiving.
validation.description: The Purchase Order cannot be acknowledged via this web service if any of the following are true: 1) it is not in an Issued status, 2) it contains contingent worker lines, 3) it is canceled, or 4) It contains lines closed for receiving.
